debates.showAs: Developer Profits Transparency Bill 2023: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Developer Profits Transparency Bill 2023: Second Stage [Private Members]
Developer Profits Transparency Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to introduce a requirement for property developers who are in receipt of State subsidies to publish annual financial statements.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thabhairt isteach ceanglais go bhfoilseoidh forbróirí réadmhaoine a fhaigheann fóirdheontais Stáit ráitis airgeadais bhliantúla.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thrédhearcacht Brabús Forbróirí, 2023

debates.showAs: Tenancy Protection Bill 2023: Second Stage [Private Members]

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend section 35A of the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 (as amended) so as to protect tenants of multi-unit developments from large-scale evictions.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú alt 35A den Acht um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 (arna leasú) d’fhonn tionóntaí forbairtí ilaonad a chosaint ar dhíshealbhuithe mórscála.

debates.showAs: Ban on Sex for Rent Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Ban on Sex for Rent Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to create an offence of requiring or accepting sex as a condition of accommodation and an offence of arranging or facilitating the requirement or acceptance of sex as a condition of accommodation.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chruthú cion arb éard é a cheangal go mbeidh gnéas ina choinníoll cóiríochta nó gnéas a ghlacadh mar choinníoll cóiríochta agus cion arb éard é an ceanglas maidir le gnéas, nó glacadh le gnéas, mar choinníoll cóiríochta a shocrú nó a éascú.
bill.shortTitleEn: Ban on Sex for Rent Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosc ar Ghnéas i gComhair Cíosa, 2022

debates.showAs: Residential Tenancies (Amendment) (Extension of Notice Periods) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Residential Tenancies (Amendment) (Extension of Notice Periods) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled Act to provide for the automatic extension of notice periods with respect to residential tenancies where a tenant is certified as at risk of homelessness and for that purpose to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tréimhsí fógra a fhadú go huathoibríoch maidir le tionóntachtaí cónaithe i gcás go ndeimhnítear go bhfuil tionónta i mbaol na heaspa dídine agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Residential Tenancies (Amendment) (Extension of Notice Periods) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Leasú) (Tréimhsí Fógra a Fhadú), 2021

debates.showAs: Property Services (Land Price Register) Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Property Services (Land Price Register) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Property Services (Land Price Register) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Property Services (Regulation) Act 2011 to provide for transparency regarding transactions involving property and for those purposes to expand the register that records residential property sales prices, to establish a land and other non-residential property transaction database and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta um Sheirbhísí Maoine (Rialáil), 2011 chun socrú a dhéanamh i dtaobh trédhearcacht maidir le hidirbhearta lena ngabhann maoin agus, chun na gcríoch sin, chun an clár a mhéadú ina dtaifeadtear praghasanna díolachán maoine cónaithe, chun bunachar sonraí um idirbhearta talún agus maoine eile neamhchónaithe a bhunú agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Sheirbhísí Maoine (Clár um Praghsanna Talún), 2021

debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Amendment) (Repeal of Part V Leasing) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Planning and Development (Amendment) (Repeal of Part V Leasing) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to repeal the parts of the Planning and Development Act 2000 that provide for the provision of social housing via Part V leasing.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d’aisghairm na gcodanna den Acht um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 lena ndéantar socrú maidir le tithíocht shóisialta a sholáthar trí léasú Chuid V.
bill.shortTitleEn: Planning and Development (Amendment) (Repeal of Part V Leasing) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Leasú) (Léasú Chuid V a Aisghairm), 2021

debates.showAs: Residential Tenancies (Student Rents and Other Protections) (Covid-19) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Residential Tenancies (Student Rents and Other Protections) (Covid-19) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision in relation to certain tenants’ obligations to pay rent in respect of dwellings used for accommodation during academic term times, to make provision in relation to the maximum period of notice required by such tenants to terminate a tenancy, to oblige certain landlords to refund relevant payments in certain circumstances relating to Covid-19, for those purposes to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú i ndáil le hoibleagáidí de chuid tionóntaí áirithe cíos a íoc i leith teaghaisí a úsáidtear le haghaidh cóiríochta le linn amanna an téarma acadúil, do dhéanamh socrú i ndáil leis an tréimhse fógra uasta a cheanglaíonn tionóntaí den sórt sin a thabhairt chun tionóntacht a fhoirceannadh, do chur oibleagáid ar thiarnaí talún áirithe íocaíochtaí iomchuí a aisíoc in imthosca áirithe a bhaineann le Covid-19, chun na gcríoch sin do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Residential Tenancies (Student Rents and Other Protections) (Covid-19) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Cíosanna agus Cosaintí Eile do Mhic Léinn) (Covid-19), 2021
